about_the_game:
Dive into a Coastal Adventure

Step into the vibrant world of Sea Town - Fish Market Simulator and experience the thrill of coastal life as you build and expand your own fishing business. Start your journey on a charming island and explore a vast ocean filled with diverse islands, each offering unique economies and rare fish species to discover.




Navigate a Dynamic Economy

In Sea Town - Fish Market Simulator, the economy is always shifting, with fish prices fluctuating daily. Make smart, strategic decisions about when and where to sell your catch to maximize profits. Expand your business by opening and upgrading market stalls and marketplaces on different islands, creating a powerful trade network that spans the seas.




Grow and Upgrade Your Empire

Upgrade your boats, fishing gear, baits, and market stalls to boost efficiency, catch rarer fish, and drive profits higher. You can strategically open new market stalls across different islands to expand your reach and influence, ultimately growing your fishing empire.




Experience Island Life
It’s not just about business—after a day at sea, unwind at the local tavern, socialize with the locals, and hire workers to help manage your growing enterprise. Take charge of a crew that assists with fishing, transporting goods, and running your upgraded market stalls, freeing you to focus on expansion.




Immerse Yourself in a Living World
Enter a dynamic world where a day-night cycle influences everything from the fish you catch to the activities available. Plan your day wisely to maximize success and take advantage of every opportunity in this engaging blend of strategy, exploration, and social interaction.


Are you ready to dominate the market? Sea Town - Fish Market Simulator offers a captivating experience where you’ll grow your fishing empire, explore vast seas, and become the master of the trade.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 2GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit

short_description: Build your fishing empire in Sea Town - Fish Market Simulator! Explore oceans, upgrade boats, and conquer a dynamic market across unique islands. Ready to rule the seas? Start now!
